panels.description: $Cluster: Number of queries executed and indexed local queries performed on all maps
panels.title: Map Query Count (aggregate)

panels.description: $Cluster: Average hit latency on the index across all members in the cluster
panels.title: Indexes: Average Hit Latency

panels.description: $Cluster: Average total latency for index write operations across all members in the cluster
panels.title: Indexes: Map Average Total Latency

panels.description: $Cluster: Number of insert operations performed on the index
panels.title: Indexes: Insert Count

panels.description: $Cluster: Total latency of update operations performed on the index
panels.title: Indexes: Total Insert Latency

panels.description: $Cluster: Number of update operations performed on the index
panels.title: Indexes: Update Count

panels.description: $Cluster: Total latency of update operations performed on the index
panels.title: Indexes: Total Update Latency

panels.description: $Cluster: Number of remove operations performed on the index
panels.title: Indexes: Remove Count

panels.description: $Cluster: Total latency of remove operations performed on the index
panels.title: Indexes: Total Remove Latency

panels.description: $Cluster: Total number of index hits (the value of this metric may be greater than the map.index.queryCount since a single query may hit the same index more than once)
panels.title: Indexes: Average Hit Count

panels.description: $Cluster: Average hit latency for the index on each member
panels.title: Average Index Hit Latency

panels.description: $Cluster: Average selectivity of the hits served by the index on this member (the returned value is in the range from 0.0 to 1.0 - values close to 1.0 indicate a high selectivity meaning the index is efficient; values close to 0.0 indicate a low selectivity meaning the index efficiency is approaching an efficiency of a simple full scan)
panels.title: Indexes: Aveage Hit Selectivity

panels.description: $Cluster: Total number of queries served by the index
panels.title: Indexes: Query Count

panels.description: $Cluster: Local memory cost of the index (for on-heap indexes in OBJECT or BINARY formats, the returned value is just a best-effort approximation and doesnt indicate a precise on-heap memory usage of the index)
panels.title: Indexes: Memory Cost
